name: WebParty
description:
a little online game where you call your friends to a web party, you can use the screen to see youtube videos using the link. 

CONTROLSWASD - MoveSpace - JumpF - interact with objects

the game is still in progress and doesn't have much added stuff. there are still a lot of bugs involving the video synchronization but I'm solving

IDEIAS

with your support I will improve every aspect of this game, putting mini games and different rooms with different themes

- add a ping pong table   - add a 3-card poker table   - add the mini bowling game   - add the basketball mini game
